text: 7.8 Stt 17.10-14, 21.2-4, 25.26, 29.31–35.18 Pen God Eblaham nop takaw ag adek nokom lɨl agak, Ñapay nad tɨke, tɨkel tɨk dad amɨl tɨkɨnɨgabal okok, nɨbop mɨdupsek kod yenɨgayn ak nɨm, wak tɨbɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak. Agek, kɨdek Eblaham ñɨne Aysak nop tɨkɨl, ñɨn anep kugul ak mɨdɨl, ñɨn jel ak wak nop ak tɨbɨlɨkak agak. Aysak pen Jekop nop tɨkak agak. Jekop ne pen, ñɨ anep umɨgan ak kɨlop tɨkek nɨm, chɨn Juda binɨb jɨj keke mɨdobun agak.
